title: RADS ERROR
body: I attempted to login to league 2 days ago and  a RADS error popped up. I looked up the various ways to fix it such as downloading a different rads kernel, updating windows,restarting your modem and uninstalling and reinstalling league. None of these worked for me. I have gone so far as to do 2 system restores. 1 a week ago and ,when that didnt do it, one a month ago. This has also not solved my problem. I did a reset on my modem. Nope. I've scoured every bit of my computer and found nothing while doing various virus scans which have turned nothing up as well. I've gone through pages and pages of league forums with 0 'fixes' that have done nothing for me. I cannot think of anything else that could be the problem. I cannot redownload league from the website as it says i cannot connect to league.com nor can i go straight to the support team as that does the same thing. So basically im asking for a freaking way to fix this because im all out of ideas.

replies.body:
Hey everyone,

This may be due to some DNS issues that occurred over the weekend.  Kao Atlantis made a great post on how you can usually resolve this, which you can find [here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/kurM3m1i-riot-admins-i-got-a-good-one-for-you-i-can-not-play-download-or-view-any-part-of-the-support-pg?comment=0002).

Hope this helps!

I really need help with this and it didn't work and I have spent over 300$ on LoL and I cant log in this is getting really annoying so please find a fix or something! {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{champion:32}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
Yup last night i tried the dns flush/going onto a puclic server. Worked. Can't believe it. Basically the last thing there was to try.
Me too. It stinks.  And they seem to be doing nothing.  And, when I click on support, I get a weird zendesk "You can buy this page" message.  WTF is going on?
I thought i was alone in this until i looked at the recent board posts. How is rito gonna leave us hangin like this?
I'm still waiting.  Meanwhile, been playing Dota 2.  Good job Riot.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/peVhMJAo-the-wrenchmens-toolbox-common-solutions-to-your-problems-technical-issues

but what i did was use a VPN(hotspot shield and it works) but extreme lag that makes league not usable

Yess! Someone is having my problem! I've been looking EVERYWHERE for a solution. Nothing came up! I clicked the LoL icon, but it just gives me a message box that says "Could not connect to the HTTP server.  Please check that your Internet connection is enabled and that your firewall is not blocking access." I tried everything it asked me to. Checked my internet, reconnected it, checked my firewall, reinstalled league, asked my friends for help... I'm legit scrambling and will do anything to get League back. I didn't know if it was my laptop having problems or Riot having a problem. 
I don't know what's going on, and I'm dying to find a way back in.
if rito had a solution they would have officially announced it already. this is going to take a long time, mark my words
